sourcesContent:
<form ngForm>
    <label>job field</label>
    <select type="text"  [(ngModel)]="field" name="field" >
        <option selected>All</option>
        <option *ngFor=" let field of fieldsList">{{field()}}</option>
    </select>
    <label>job area</label>
    <select type="text" [(ngModel)]="area" name="area"   >
        <option selected>All</option>
        <option *ngFor=" let area of areasList">{{area}}</option>
    </select>
    <button type="submit" (click)="filter()">search</button>
</form>
